h1_38: University of Illinois College of Medicine at Peoria Program
h3_39: University of Illinois College of Medicine at Peoria
p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_100: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_103: The goal of our radiology residency is to produce well-trained radiologists, competent in all aspects of medical imaging. The department is digital and fully integrated with PACS. Each resident has a work station for reviewing and dictating cases.

p_355: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
